definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: These activities were carried out in a computer-generated virtual environment.
sentences.chinese: 這些活動在計算機模擬的虛擬環境中完成。

sentences.english: VR model for a tanker produced by using virtual reality software VRT is given, which can interact with users by mouse.
sentences.chinese: 給出應用虛擬環境系統VRT生成的可交互油船模型。

sentences.english: Transmission mechanism of interactive information in CVE .
sentences.chinese: 協同虛擬環境中的交互信息傳輸機制。

sentences.english: The intervisibility testing algorithm in the virtual environment that based on the LOS (line of sight) is researched on.
sentences.chinese: 對虛擬環境中點到點的通視性檢查算法進行了研究。

sentences.english: In the virtual world, though, the denominator can now be a random value as well.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在虛擬環境中，分母現在也是隨機的值。
